import photosnap from '../images/photosnap.svg' import manage from '../images/manage.svg' import account from '../images/account.svg' import myhome from '../images/myhome.svg' import loop from '../images/loop-studios.svg' import faceit from '../images/faceit.svg' import shortly from '../images/shortly.svg' import insure from '../images/insure.svg' import eyecam from '../images/eyecam-co.svg' import air from '../images/the-air-filter-company.svg' export default function Container(props){ function showing(e){ props.show(e) } const logos = { "Photosnap" : photosnap, "Manage" : manage, "Account" :account, "MyHome" : myhome, "Loop Studios" : loop, "FaceIt" : faceit, "Shortly" : shortly, "Insure" :insure, "Eyecam Co." : eyecam, "The Air Filter Company" : air } const logoSrc = companyLogos[props.company]; return

{props.company}{props.new && {props.new}!} {props.featured && {props.featured}}

{props.position}

{props.postedAt}.{props.contract}.{props.location}
{props.role}
{props.level}
{props.languages.map((language, index) => (
{language}
))} {props.tools && props.tools.length > 0 && ( // Check if props.tools is defined and not empty
{props.tools}
)}
}
